item.title: 钉钉群机器人推送脚本
item.description:
import requests import json import os, sys class PushMessage: def __init__(self): # self.test_ip_lst = ['114.114.114.114','223.5.5.5'] self.test_ip_lst = ["23.134.37.253","59.214.26.21","23.137.37.1"] self.alarm_info = '电子政务外网地址探测:
' self.is_atall = 'false' self.dingding_url = "https://oapi.dingtalk.com/robot/send?access_token=1c1" self.push = False def dingding_qun(self): headers = { 'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=utf-8' } url = """{}""".format(self.dingding_url) # data_markdown = { # "msgtype": "markdown", # "markdown": { # "title":"杭州天气", # "text": "#### 杭州天气 @18182294500 
> 9度，西北风1级，空气良89，相对温度73%

> ###### 10点20分发布 [天气](https://www.dingalk.com) 
" # }, # "at": { # "atMobiles": [ # "18500" # ], # "atUserIds": [ # "user123" # ], # "isAtAll": "false" # } # } data_text = { "at": { "atMobiles": [ "" ], "atUserIds": [ "user123" ], "isAtAll": "{}".
